scaffold.title: ALU Visualizer
scaffold.subtitle: Scaffolding is ready. Tooling, testing, Storybook, and PWA support are configured so later phases can focus on simulation logic and pedagogy.

checkpoints.tooling: ✅ Tooling baseline locked in (Vite, Tailwind, Headless UI, strict ESLint/Prettier).
checkpoints.testing: ✅ Testing harness ready (Vitest, Testing Library, Playwright).
checkpoints.storybook: ✅ Storybook Vite builder available for component-first development.
checkpoints.pwa: ✅ Offline-ready PWA foundation configured via vite-plugin-pwa.

nextSteps.title: What comes next
nextSteps.body: Phase 1 will focus on the pure simulation core. Once the numeric utilities land, the UI can project genuine ALU states instead of placeholders.

scaffold.footer: Crafted for clarity • Pedagogy first • Ready for the next build phase
